name: Chum Garden
description:
Step into the Chum Garden, a micro virtual pet available for Android phones. Take your chums into the four available mini games and collect coins and foods. Race around tropical islands collecting coins in Treasure Cruise, catch fish for your Chums in Let's go Fishing,  shoot hoops in Chum Ball and take your Chums on a stroll looking for goodies in the Chum Adventure! 

Name your Chums and Feed them to enhance their starts and watch them grow into different forms. 

Created in 5 days for the University of Portsmouth GameJam 2019.

Created by Marc Cook (@Marc Cook_) LeeAnn Picknett (@LeeAnnBella) and Jahangir Uddin (@HotStuffGames) with music by Tom Garner (@TomAGarner)
